admin_templates.template: <input type="hidden" name="checkboxes[]" value="{$property.property_definition_id}" /> <xen:selectunit name="properties[{$property.property_definition_id}]" value="{$property.propertyValueScalar}" label="{$property.title}"> <xen:option value="ui.totop_black" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_black}" /> <xen:option value="ui.totop_white" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_white}" /> <xen:option value="ui.totop_red" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_red}" /> <xen:option value="ui.totop_green" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_green}" /> <xen:option value="ui.totop_blue" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_blue}" /> <xen:option value="ui.totop_yellow" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_yellow}" /> <xen:option value="ui.totop_purple" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_purple}" /> <xen:option value="ui.totop_adaptative" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_adaptative}" /> <xen:option value="css" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_pure_css}" /> <xen:option value="css_adv" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_pure_css_advanced}" /> <xen:explain>{$property.description}</xen:explain> <xen:html><xen:include template="style_property_unit_extra"><xen:set var="$reset">{xen:phrase reset}</xen:set></xen:include></xen:html> </xen:selectunit>

<input type="hidden" name="checkboxes[]" value="{$property.property_definition_id}" /> <xen:selectunit name="properties[{$property.property_definition_id}]" value="{$property.propertyValueScalar}" label="{$property.title}"> <xen:option value="linear" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_easing_linear}" /> <xen:option value="easeInQuad" label="easeInQuad" /> <xen:option value="easeInQuad" label="easeInQuad" /> <xen:option value="easeOutQuad" label="easeOutQuad" /> <xen:option value="easeInOutQuad" label="easeInOutQuad" /> <xen:option value="easeInCubic" label="easeInCubic" /> <xen:option value="easeOutCubic" label="easeOutCubic" /> <xen:option value="easeInOutCubic" label="easeInOutCubic" /> <xen:option value="easeInQuart" label="easeInQuart" /> <xen:option value="easeOutQuart" label="easeOutQuart" /> <xen:option value="easeInOutQuart" label="easeInOutQuart" /> <xen:option value="easeInQuint" label="easeInQuint" /> <xen:option value="easeOutQuint" label="easeOutQuint" /> <xen:option value="easeInOutQuint" label="easeInOutQuint" /> <xen:option value="easeInSine" label="easeInSine" /> <xen:option value="easeOutSine" label="easeOutSine" /> <xen:option value="easeInOutSine" label="easeInOutSine" /> <xen:option value="easeInExpo" label="easeInExpo" /> <xen:option value="easeOutExpo" label="easeOutExpo" /> <xen:option value="easeInOutExpo" label="easeInOutExpo" /> <xen:option value="easeInCirc" label="easeInCirc" /> <xen:option value="easeOutCirc" label="easeOutCirc" /> <xen:option value="easeInOutCirc" label="easeInOutCirc" /> <xen:option value="easeInElastic" label="easeInElastic" /> <xen:option value="easeOutElastic" label="easeOutElastic" /> <xen:option value="easeInOutElastic" label="easeInOutElastic" /> <xen:option value="easeInBack" label="easeInBack" /> <xen:option value="easeOutBack" label="easeOutBack" /> <xen:option value="easeInOutBack" label="easeInOutBack" /> <xen:option value="easeInBounce" label="easeInBounce" /> <xen:option value="easeOutBounce" label="easeOutBounce" /> <xen:explain>{$property.description}</xen:explain> <xen:html><xen:include template="style_property_unit_extra"><xen:set var="$reset">{xen:phrase reset}</xen:set></xen:include></xen:html> </xen:selectunit>

<input type="hidden" name="checkboxes[]" value="{$property.property_definition_id}" /> <xen:radiounit name="properties[{$property.property_definition_id}]" value="{$property.propertyValueScalar}" label="{$property.title}"> <xen:option value="normal" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_normal}" /> <xen:option value="mini" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_mini}" /> <xen:explain>{$property.description}</xen:explain> <xen:html><xen:include template="style_property_unit_extra"><xen:set var="$reset">{xen:phrase reset}</xen:set></xen:include></xen:html> </xen:radiounit>

<input type="hidden" name="checkboxes[]" value="{$property.property_definition_id}" /> <xen:radiounit name="properties[{$property.property_definition_id}]" value="{$property.propertyValueScalar}" label="{$property.title}"> <xen:option value="normal" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_normal}" /> <xen:option value="mini" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_mini}" /> <xen:option value="none" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_none}" /> <xen:explain>{$property.description}</xen:explain> <xen:html><xen:include template="style_property_unit_extra"><xen:set var="$reset">{xen:phrase reset}</xen:set></xen:include></xen:html> </xen:radiounit>

<input type="hidden" name="checkboxes[]" value="{$property.property_definition_id}" /> <xen:if is="{$visitor.getBrowser}"> <xen:radiounit name="properties[{$property.property_definition_id}]" value="{$property.propertyValueScalar}" label="{$property.title}"> <xen:option value="normal" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_normal}" /> <xen:option value="mini" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_mini}" /> <xen:option value="none" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_none}" /> <xen:explain>{$property.description}</xen:explain> <xen:html><xen:include template="style_property_unit_extra"><xen:set var="$reset">{xen:phrase reset}</xen:set></xen:include></xen:html> </xen:radiounit> <xen:else /> <xen:radiounit name="properties[{$property.property_definition_id}]" value="{$property.propertyValueScalar}" label="{$property.title}"> <xen:option value="error" label="{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_notavailable}" /> <xen:explain>{$property.description}</xen:explain> <xen:html><xen:include template="style_property_unit_extra"><xen:set var="$reset">{xen:phrase reset}</xen:set></xen:include></xen:html> </xen:radiounit> </xen:if>

phrases.phrase: Choose the style of the button 'Go To Top'. Advice: check the "pure css" styles.
Choose which 'Easing' effect the AutoScroll should use
Default is 600 (milliseconds) - Time the button will spend to display with fading
Default is 200 (px). When the scrollbar will reach that value from the top screen, the button will then appear.
Default is 400 (milliseconds) - Time the button will spend to disappear with fading
This option will reverse the block hover color with the hover color of the top/down elements.
Only available with the Pure Css Top/Down theme. Everything is automatic.
Default is 800 (milliseconds) - Higher the value will be, the longer you will have to wait for the scrollbar to reach the top

This setting will allow you to automatically hide the "Go To Top" block after a delay once you've finished to scroll or left the block. Default is 3000ms (3 seconds). You can disable this delay setting it to 0. On touch screens this delay is 6s.
Choose which type the button 'Go To Top' should use on mobile devices (phones, tablets, etc.). Recommended option: 'none' (it doesn't seem to work well on some devices).
Choose which type the button 'Go To Top' should use on tablet devices. If the option is not available, you will need to install an external addon named "Browser Detection (Mobile/MSIE)".
Choose which type the button 'Go To Top' should use
To make it vertical-align to the screen, just use 50%. Default value: 10px.
To make it vertical-align to the screen, just use 50%. Default value: 10px.

property.title: 'Go To Top !' Button Style
property.description: Choose the style of the button 'Go To Top'. Advice: check the "pure css" styles.

property.title: 'Go To Top !' Button Type (normal devices)
property.description: Choose which type the button 'Go To Top' should use

property.title: 'Go To Top !' Easing AutoScroll Effect
property.description: Choose which 'Easing' effect the AutoScroll should use

property.title: Scroll Speed
property.description: Default is 800 (milliseconds) - Higher the value will be, the longer you will have to wait for the scrollbar to reach the top

property.title: Minimum Height
property.description: Default is 200 (px). When the scrollbar will reach that value from the top screen, the button will then appear.

property.title: In Delay
property.description: Default is 600 (milliseconds) - Time the button will spend to display with fading

property.title: Out Delay
property.description: Default is 400 (milliseconds) - Time the button will spend to disappear with fading

property.title: 'Go To Top !' Button Type (mobile devices)
property.description: Choose which type the button 'Go To Top' should use on mobile devices (phones, tablets, etc.). Recommended option: 'none' (it doesn't seem to work well on some devices).

property.title: 'Go To Top !' Button Type (tablet devices)
property.description: Choose which type the button 'Go To Top' should use on tablet devices. If the option is not available, you will need to install an external addon named "Browser Detection (Mobile/MSIE)".

property.title: Timeout Delay
property.description: This setting will allow you to automatically hide the "Go To Top" block after a delay once you've finished to scroll or left the block. Default is 3000ms (3 seconds). You can disable this delay setting it to 0. On touch screens this delay is 6s.

property.title: Pure css - Top/Down - Reverse colors
property.description: This option will reverse the block hover color with the hover color of the top/down elements.

property.title: Enable the QuoteME Trigger ?
property.description: Only available with the Pure Css Top/Down theme. Everything is automatic.

property.title: Block bottom position
property.description: To make it vertical-align to the screen, just use 50%. Default value: 10px.

property.title: Block right position
property.description: To make it vertical-align to the screen, just use 50%. Default value: 10px.

templates.template:
• {xen:phrase sedo_gototop_up}
  • «abc»
    •
  • {xen:phrase sedo_gototop_down}

{xen:phrase sedo_gototop_up}

<xen:set var="$liDiv">{xen:if "{xen:property gototopQm}", 3, 2}</xen:set>

.SedoGoToTop {
	{xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss}
	height: auto;
	bottom: {xen:property gototop_pos_bottom};
	right: {xen:property gototop_pos_left_right};	
}



.SedoGoToTop.mini {
	{xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss_mini}
	height: auto;	
}

.SedoGoToTop:active, #toTop:focus {
	outline:none;
}

.SedoGoToTop #toTopHover {
	{xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss_hover}
	filter: alpha(opacity=0);
	width: {xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss.width};
	height: 100%;
	{xen:if "{xen:property gototopColor} == 'css_adv' AND {xen:property gototopPureTdReverse}", "background-color: {xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss_updown_item.background-color}"}
}

.SedoGoToTop.mini #toTopHover {
	width: {xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss_mini.width};
}

.SedoGoToTop ul {
	display: inline-block;
	text-align: center;
	vertical-align: middle;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
}

.SedoGoToTop ul li {
	padding-bottom: 2px;
	-moz-user-select: -moz-none;
	-khtml-user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
	-ms-user-select: none;
	user-select: none;
}

.SedoGoToTop ul li:first-child,
.SedoGoToTop ul li.AdvQm {
	border-bottom: 1px solid {xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss.color};
}

.SedoGoToTop #toTopHover ul li:first-child,
.SedoGoToTop #toTopHover ul li.AdvQm {
	border-bottom: 1px solid {xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss_hover.color};
}

.SedoGoToTop li{
	height: {xen:calc '({xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss.height}/{$liDiv})+({$liDiv}-1)'}px;
	line-height: {xen:calc '({xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss.height}/{$liDiv})+({$liDiv}-1)'}px;
}

.SedoGoToTop.mini li{
	height: {xen:calc '({xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss_mini.height}/{$liDiv})+({$liDiv}-1)'}px;
	line-height: {xen:calc '({xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss_mini.height}/{$liDiv})+({$liDiv}-1)'}px;
}

.SedoGoToTop ul li:hover {
	{xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss_updown_item}
	{xen:if "{xen:property gototopColor} == 'css_adv' AND {xen:property gototopPureTdReverse}", "background-color: {xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss_hover.background-color}"}	
}

.SedoGoToTop p.solo {
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	text-align: center;
	height: {xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss.height};
	line-height: {xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss.height};
}

.SedoGoToTop.mini p.solo {
	height: {xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss_mini.height};
	line-height: {xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss_mini.height};
}


.SedoGoToTop ul li.AdvQm {
	{xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss_updown_qm}
}


.SedoGoToTop.mini ul li.AdvQm {
	{xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss_ud_qm_mini}
}

.SedoGoToTop ul li.AdvQm.active {
	{xen:property sedo_gototop_purecss_updown_qm_act}
}
